page.title: 02THE PEOPLE IN MY FAMILY
page.content: My Dad likes betting on horses. Every Saturday he gets out his tickets and decides which horses he is going to bet on.From then on no-one is allowed to watch television.My Dad doesn't normally win anything but one day he won Â£407,but he does put a lot on the horses.Nearly every day he bets Â£5. My Mum likes to do crosswords in the newspaper. Every day no-one can have the news before she does. She can do crosswords for hours until my Dad comes home.My sister always gets me into trouble because if she hits me and then I hit her I'm the one who gets in trouble. She can go out to play until about 7 o'clock and then she goes to bed about 8 o'clock. My sister is 6 and she also goes to Forches Cross school. By Wayne Passmore.
